entries.title: Monetary policy - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The primary objective of monetary policy in the euro area is price stability, which implies avoiding prolonged inflation and deflation.

entries.title: Macroprudential policy - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The main objective of macro-prudential policy is to reduce the build-up of risks in the financial sector and significant spill-overs to the real economy.
